definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: The smoke almost choked the fireman.
sentences.chinese: 消防隊員幾乎被煙燻得透不過氣來。

sentences.english: I breathed again: my blood resumed its flow.
sentences.chinese: 我又喘過氣來了，我的血液也繼續流動。

sentences.english: Which ONE of the following brand is link to obsolete?
sentences.chinese: 以下哪一個手提電話品牌令你聯想是過氣？

sentences.english: Marguerite, extremely pale and with her mouth half open, was trying to catch her breath.
sentences.chinese: 瑪格麗特的臉色蒼白，嘴半張着，竭力想喘過氣來。

sentences.english: The room was so stuffy that one could hardly breathe.
sentences.chinese: 屋裏太悶，憋得人透不過氣來。

sentences.english: The baby couldn't breathe because its nose was congested.
sentences.chinese: 嬰兒鼻子塞住，透不過氣來。

sentences.english: Have you been thinking angry thoughts about someone?
China is literally choking on their environmental disaster.
sentences.chinese: 中國在環境災害上確實透不過氣來。

sentences.english: As many people are smoking here , I am unable to breathe because of the smoke.
sentences.chinese: 許多人在這裏抽菸，所以我被煙嗆得透不過氣來。

sentences.english: To choke or gasp, as in swallowing large amounts of liquid.
sentences.chinese: 噎住或透不過氣來，如在吞下大量液體的時候。

sentences.english: He has a feeling of tightness in the chest or a feeling that he is suffocating.
sentences.chinese: 他胸部覺得悶悶的，好像透不過氣來。

sentences.english: Another Western shibboleth about the future will thereby fall.
sentences.chinese: 另一個西方對未來的過氣觀點也會因此隕落。

sentences.english: He was famously a fan of the superannuated British rockers Deep Purple.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知他是過氣的英國搖滾樂隊“深紫”的粉絲。

sentences.english: The silence makes you vomit, but angry!
sentences.chinese: 你的沉默讓秂吐卜過氣。

definition: to realize suddenly/to wake up with a start
eyes brimming with tears of excitement (idiom)/extremely moved
to leap and frisk about (idiom); lively/healthy and active
to suffer untold hardships (idiom); trials and tribulations/with difficulty/after some effort
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
to worry/to fret/to be anxious/to become sad
